actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To require railroads to report actions taken to remedy failures to comply with railroad safety provisions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue rules, regulations, orders, or standards to require that any railroad notified of a failure to comply with railroad safety shall report to the Secretary on actions taken to remedy that failure. Directs the Secretary to ensure that accurate records are maintained with respect to the cancellation of any scheduled inspection, assessment, or examination. Requires States to keep appropriate records in carrying out investigative and surveillance activities.

titles.title: To require railroads to report actions taken to remedy failures to comply with railroad safety provisions, and for other purposes.
